title: Crime Alert 12.10.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.10.18
description:
Prosecutors seek death penalty for border agent who allegedly said he killed 4 sex workers to ‘clean up the streets. Teacher arrested for forcibly cutting child's hair. Killer dad Chris Watts may have faked calls to hospitals, pretending to look for missing pregnant wife and two little girls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
